resources.string: Your Profile Details are listed below:
This notification confirms that the order is placed
You do not have any favorite restaurants
You haven\'t placed any orders yet

A.1 Once you have found your preferred restaurant simply select your time and date and then so long as we have an email address and phone number your booking is instantly confirmed the minute you hit "Book Now".
A.2 Average timing for all Restaurants may be from 9AM to 10PM, Some might open or close in hour duration.
A.4 You can do this by calling your restaurant direct. If you need to cancel less than 24 hours before your dinner date you can use the cancellation link within your reminder email.

A.3 All Restaurants are committed to honour any confirmed bookings we have generated. For added peace of mind you should always reconfirm your booking using the link included in your reminder email, and it is also a good idea to take your confirmation email with you.
A.5 You can choose your preferred Offers and Deals that we provide and pay only for it.

A.6 Unfortunately some restaurants do not take bookings or have not yet shifted to a digital booking system. When possible we still list these restaurants onsite and we promise to tell the restaurant customers like you need them .
